text: Carla Paolina Gallo (born June 24, 1975) is an American actress notable for recurring roles in the television series Undeclared, Carnivàle, Bones, Californication, and a number of film roles. Since her role on Undeclared, she has made frequent appearances in other Judd Apatow productions. She graduated from Cornell University with a degree in Theater. Her best friend since childhood is Sarah Paulson ==Personal life== Gallo announced she was six months pregnant with her first child, in April 2014, at the L.A premiere of Neighbors. She gave birth to a daughter in the summer of 2014. She gave birth to her second daughter in May 2017. Her husband is screenwriter Mark Satterthwaite. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
